channel.title: [508]Teleport command

item.title: [508]Teleport command
item.dc:creator: @neXuscoder neXuscoder
item.description:
@neXuscoder wrote:

Hello ! I’m need help with teleport commands on mithscape 508 source… I’m added a Jad in to npcspawn.cfg… Compiled jad is ingame… So… I’m have jad in npcspawn.cfg like this :
spawn = 2745 3159 9903 0 0 0 0 0 Jad
So… I’m don’t know how to write coords to command :
}
if (cmd[0].equals(“jad”)) {
p.objects();
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Welcome at Jad ! Good luck !”);
p.teleportTo(3087 + Misc.random(2), 3518 + Misc.random(2), 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0);
Can anyone help me how to add coords to this ? I’m trying to create my first teleport commands PLEASE HELP ME
Thanks for reading

Read full topic
